sequence.name: Standard Client Task Sequence
sequence.description: A complete task sequence for deploying a client operating system

expression.variable: SELECT * FROM Win32_Tpm WHERE NOT SpecVersion LIKE "1.2"
SELECT * FROM Win32_Tpm WHERE NOT SpecVersion LIKE "2.0"
SELECT * FROM Win32_Tpm WHERE NOT SpecVersion LIKE "1.2"

step.name: Opt In to CEIP and WER

expression.variable: SELECT * FROM Win32_Baseboard WHERE Product LIKE "CF31-4%" or Product LIKE "CF31W-4%"
SELECT * FROM Win32_Baseboard WHERE Product LIKE "CF31-5%" or Product LIKE "CF31W-5%"
SELECT * FROM Win32_Baseboard WHERE Product LIKE "CF54-2%" or Product LIKE "CF54W-2%"

step.name: Lock Machine
step.description: Lock machine in order to tell Windows to create a new Start Screen image (for new resolution), that will soon be replaced with the"Replace Win 8 Start Screen" application.

step.name: Restart computer
step.description: Particially for TPM activation and also allowing Display Resolution to update.

step.name: Set Panasonic Password to NEVEREXPIRE
step.action: WMIC USERACCOUNT WHERE "Name='Panasonic User'" SET PasswordExpires=FALSE

step.name: Add mass storage drivers to sysprep.inf for XP and 2003
Add mass storage drivers to sysprep.inf for XP and 2003
